Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
Analysis Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: After sorting dataset by the KEYS, set to 1 for the first record per subject, then incremented by 1 for each subsequent record.

Label: Analysis Category 1
XL Comments: ML 2/8/25: For ACAT1 specs is not consitent with data. Please update to:                                                                                   if prcat in ('CONCOMITANT AND SUBSEQUENT LOCAL RADIATION THERAPY', 'HISTORY OF LOCAL RADIATION THERAPY') then ACAT1= 'Radiation Therapy';                                                                                             if prcat in ('CONCOMITANT/SUBSEQUENT SURGERY AND PROCS', 'HISTORY OF SURGERIES AND PROCEDURES') then ACAT1=  'Surgery/Procedures'.

Label: Analysis Name of Procedure
Study Day of Start of Procedure
Analysis Start Date
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Calculated as PR.PRSTDTC as a SAS numeric date variable.
If PR.PRSTDTC is a partial date then imputed according to PR.PRCAT.

If PRCAT in ('HISTORY OF LOCAL RADIATION THERAPY', 'HISTORY OF SURGERIES AND PROCEDURES') then imputed as follows:
• If PRSTDTC is completely missing: not imputed.
• If PRSTDTC has only year populated (or year and day), then month and day set to January 1st.
• If PRSTDTC has year and month only, then day set to 1st day of month.

If PRCAT in ('CONCOMITANT AND SUBSEQUENT LOCAL RADIATION THERAPY', 'CONCOMITANT/SUBSEQUENT SURGERY AND PROCS', 'PRIOR AND CONCOMITANT TRANSFUSIONS') then imputed as follows:
• If PRSTDTC is completely missing, set to date of decision to discontinue treatment (ADSL.EOTDCDT) + 1.

• if PRSTDTC has only year populated (or year and day), then:
-  if year(PRSTDTC) > year(ADSL.EOTDCDT) then set to January 1st.
-  if year(PRSTDTC) = year(ADSL.EOTDCDT) then set to date of decision to discontinue treatment (ADSL.EOTDCDT) + 1.

• If PRSTDTC has year and month only, then:
-  if year(PRSTDTC) and month(PRSTDTC) are the same as year(ADSL.EOTDCDT) and month(ADSL.EOTDCDT) then set to date of decision to discontinue treatment (ADSL.EOTDCDT) + 1.
-  Otherwise, set to the first day of the month.
Notes:
Imputation rules will need review/confirmation/updating based on SAP.

Updates to imputation rules for Subsequent Anti-Cancer radiation/Surgery likely will require updates to ADCM and ADSL imputations as well.

Label: Analysis Start Date Imputation Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Based on ADPR.ASTDT imputation. Set to:
Y if entire date is imputed or year is imputed
M if month and day are imputed
D if ony day is imputed.
Null if ASTDT is null or if PR.PRSTDTC is a complete date.

Label: Analysis Start Relative Day
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
If ADPR.ASTDT < ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as: ASTDT-RANDDT
Otherwise, calculated as: ASTDT-RANDDT+1

Label: Study Day of End of Procedure
Analysis End Date
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Calculated as PR.PRENDTC as a SAS numeric date variable.
In the event of partial dates for records where PRCAT = 'CONCOMITANT AND SUBSEQUENT LOCAL RADIATION THERAPY', impute as follows:
- If PRENDTC is completely missing: do not impute.
- If PRENDTC has only year populated, then set month and day to December 31st.
- If PRENDTC has year and month only, then set day to the last day of the month. 

If PRCAT="CONCOMITANT/SUBSEQUENT SURGERY AND PROCS" then set AENDT = ASTDT

Label: Analysis End Date Imputation Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Based on ADPR.AENDT imputation. Set to:
Y if entire date is imputed or year is imputed
M if month and day are imputed
D if ony day is imputed.
Null if AENDT is null or if PR.PRENDTC is a complete date.

Label: Analysis End Relative Day
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
If ADPR.AENDT < ADSL.RANDDT then calculated as: AENDT-RANDDT
Otherwise, calculated as: AENDT-RANDDT+1.

Label: Analysis Indication
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
If ACAT1 ='Radiation Therapy' then:
If PRINDC = 'DISEASE UNDER STUDY', then set to "Disease under study".
If PRINDC starts with the text "OTHER" then set to "Other";

Otherwise, set to PRINDC.

Label: Radiation Site Type

Label: Was this a Surgical Resection of a TL?
Pre-treatment Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Expansion cohorts:
Flags procedures prior to randomization, including those that are continued on-study.

Set to "Y" if:
. < ASTDT < RANDDT or
 . < AENDT < RANDDT

Escalation cohorts:
Flags procedures prior to treatment start, including those that are continued on-study.

Set to "Y" if:
. < ASTDT < TRTSDT or
 . < AENDT < TRTSDT
Notes: Definition will need review/updating based on SAP definition.
XL Comments: XW 2/14/2025: Change RANDDT to TRTSDT for escalation cohorts

Label: Conconmitant Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Expansion cohorts:
Flags procedures after randomization, prior to treatment end.
Set to "Y" if:
ADSL.RANDDT <= ADPR.ASTDT and ( ASTDT <= ADSL.TRTEDT or TRTEDT missing) or 
RANDDT <= ADPR.AENDT and ( AENDT <= TRTEDT or TRTEDT missing) or
ADPR.PREFL = 'Y' and AENDT >= RANDDT

Escalation cohorts:
Flags procedures after treatment start, prior to treatment end.
Set to "Y" if:
ADSL.TRTSDT <= ADPR.ASTDT and ( ASTDT <= ADSL.TRTEDT or TRTEDT missing) or 
TRTSDT <= ADPR.AENDT and ( AENDT <= TRTEDT or TRTEDT missing) or
ADPR.PREFL = 'Y' and AENDT >= RANDDT
XL Comments: XW 2/14/2025: Change RANDDT to TRTSDT for escalation cohorts
